msafluid
Class MSAFluidSolver

java.lang.Object
  msafluid.MSAFluidSolver

public class MSAFluidSolver
extends java.lang.Object

this is a class for solving real-time fluid dynamics simulations based on Navier-Stokes equations and Jos Stam's approximations

Author:
Memo Akten
